rules_text:
Flying
When Atieh's Elite enters, judge another target creature you control. [i](Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.)[/i]
Whenever you honor a creature, until end of turn, that creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains flying, and becomes an Angel in addition to its other types.
